ModMetaData.name: Priority Manager
ModMetaData.author: P4RAD0X
ModMetaData.description:
Automatically assigns work priorities to colonists based on their skills, user-defined roles, and health status.
Features: - Auto-assign priorities based on colonist skills - Optional role presets (Researcher, Doctor, Farmer, etc.) or fully automatic best-job detection - Intelligent secondary job assignment (priorities 2-4) - Illness/injury response: reduces workload for sick colonists - Solo colonist survival mode: prioritizes essential tasks - Periodic auto-recalculation or manual control - Integrates directly into the Work tab - Min/Max worker controls per job type (absolute or percentage-based) - Compatible with Complex Jobs mod (auto-detects specialized work types) - Compatible with PriorityMaster mod (extends to 1-99 priority range) - Composite roles with multi-job workflows (Builder, Demolition, Medic, Industrialist)
Set a colonist's primary role or let the system figure out their best jobs automatically!
Compatibility: Works with Complex Jobs, PriorityMaster, and any mod that adds custom work types.
